name: Dash Delivery
description:
Become a delivery person and make sure all packages will reach their destination safe and sound. Drive through the neighborhood and deliver the good to the people waiting for their on-line purchases stuff.

Start playing Dash Delivery today - join Orbital Knight community loved by millions all over the world.

Follow us to get news and updates:
Facebook: @OrbitalKnight
Twitter: @OrbitalKnight
Instagram: @OrbitalKnight_Crew
